Use commitAllowingStateLoss() when committing a fragment transaction. Fixes #313. Also remove NOTE_ID_EXTRA from intent in onSaveInstanceState in NotificationsActivity, which fixes issue where you would be taken back to a note's detail view that you already viewed when returning to the notifications view.

Fixed issue where you couldn't successfully add a category that had escaped HTML in it. While I was at it, I removed the old EscapeUtils and Entities classes because we can use built in Android methods to accomplish the same task (Html.fromHtml and TextUtils.htmlEncode)
Remove old import of EscapeUtils to hopefully fix build.
If the instance state exists, pop the detail view. Fixes #436.

Post autosave was saving content and setting the changes flag, so if you tapped 'discard' you still had a saved post with the changes. Created an mOriginalPost variable to keep the original post content, which will be restored if the user taps 'discard'. Similar solutions for new posts, but they are deleted if discard is tapped. Fixes #25.
FredrichO - [#54481596] updated stats backend to use XL Studio API simulator, rather than via sample data load.
Don't unescape html that is already unescaped :) Fixes issue where image would be lost when saving a local draft.

Adding @aagam94's post excerpt patch with a few tweaks:

* Modified existing post constructor instead of creating another one.
* Used 'Excerpt' instead of 'Post excerpt' string to match up with core editor.
* Tweaked the layout margins a bit.
* Hid the excerpt field if the user is editing a Page.

Adds support for picasa images. Used @aagam94's patch with the following changes:

* Downloaded image without doing a stream copy.
* Change return types in some of the DownloadImageTask to be a bit more efficient.
* Formatted code to Android standards.

Fixes #402. Props aagam94.
Version bump.
Refactored the addMedia() method to support sharing multiple picasa images to a new post.  Removed addMediaFromShareAction() since it was very similar to addMedia() already.

Fixes #437 and other minor issues in the comments list view.

The app doesn't remember selected comments upon resume, or when the 'refresh comments' network call ends. In both cases we need to hide the 'moderate' bar.

Hide the moderate bar for now sounds ok, but I think the app  should keep a copy of selected comments, and restore them at the end of the refresh/onResume.

Merge branch 'develop' of github.com:wordpress-mobile/WordPress-Android into drag
Adding pin lock strings.

Adding check to get the role of the current user in RefreshBlogContentTask. Reason: Upon upgrading to 2.5, a user would not have the Themes menu item because the admin check only happens when you add the blog to the app.
Update PassLock to v0.0.3
Enable portrait orientation on PIN Lock
Removing fragment tag from string resources.
Removing a duplicate translation, and made the 'includes Publicize' text easier to translate by removing the HTML from the strings resource file.
Removing some duplicate strings.

Cleaned up some code in WordPressDB:

* Moved theme table creation out of the upgrade process to where it belonged with where the other tables are created.
* Removed EULA table references along with preferences migration function since it isn't being used any longer.
* Change gigantic 'if' statement for updating tables to a switch statement. Uses much less code and should be just as efficient. Props @maxme for the idea.
Removing unnecessary automattic_url string. Fixes trac #528

Enabling stats for self-hosted sites:

* API issue was fixed server-side so calls now work for Jetpack sites.
* Fixed up a few issues with the workflow for signing in to WordPress.com for a Jetpack site to access stats.
* Fixed #115 by adding infinite scroll support to the media library picker.
Fix for low resolution thumbnails in the media library gridview for WP.com and Jetpack powered blogs. Fixes #118

Fixed the MediaGalleryPickerActivity to work properly when in single select mode:

* Don't show the contextual action bar when in single select
* Show the 'Up' button
* Once an item is tapped, set result IDs and finish the activity.

Jetpack stats: Added support for catching a 403 error, in the case that a user tries to access a Jetpack site with the wrong WordPress.com account. If a 403 happens, the user is prompted to sign in to a different account.
Upgrade PINLock library to version 0.0.4 that fixes an issue with the sharing to WordPress feature.
Getting rid of unnecessary 'Themes have been refreshed' toast message.

Use Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK when starting a new activity in ShareIntentReceiverActivity. This should fix the issue reported here: https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/Android-PasscodeLock/issues/1
Updating translation strings.
Fixing crash on Android 2.3, passcode lock did not have a valid app lock because it is not supported.
Fixed issue #160: rotating device while activating theme causes activate/preview buttons to reset
Fixed issue #161
Fixes #156 and other minor issue with galleries
Fixes #163 and #168
Couldn't reproduce #167, but am adding null checks for both the uri string and Uri object in loadNetworkImage(). Fixes #167.
Clear out the imageView's image if we don't have a valid thumbnailURL. Refs #167. Props @nbradbury
Fix an issue where the user can edit a post/page again before the changes have finished uploading. Ref: https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/WordPress-Android/issues/168#issuecomment-26450190

- Fixes an issue where a Local draft post/page with pictures can be uploaded without any media attached to it.
- Properly close few cursors.
Adding WordPressDB method to get a Blog with the DotCom blogId. Changed WPComLoginActivity to not change the global WPCOM credentials when signing in from the StatsActivity.
Removing OldStatsActivity, and changed the Full site stats menu item to load wordpress.com/my-stats in the browser.
Check if site is wpcom before showing login.
Support returning WP.com blog in getBlogForDotComBlogId();

OauthAuthenticator now responsible for all auto tokens

src/org/wordpress/android/models/Blog.java
src/org/wordpress/android/ui/accounts/NewAccountAbstractPageFragment.java
src/org/wordpress/android/ui/stats/WPComLoginActivity.java
Added duplicate notification detection, hoping it helps resolve #172

Using correct token for Jetpack blogs

If a rest request is made to sites/$siteId look up the blog for that id and use the token for that JetPack user account. If no account, fetch a token and update the account record.
Change description of the issue about duplicate PNs.
Stats: Call wp.getOptions after signing in to WP.com to get the jetpack_blog_id if we don't have one yet.
Parsing notifications is now done in an AsyncTask to avoid blocking UI thread
